overview: The year is 1969. Kat just turned 18 and she's finally ready to fulfill her fantasy of posing nude in a "girly magazine".  The only problem? She doesn't know any professional photographers to take her picture.  So sly Kat borrows her uncle's instant camera and his medium format Holga, loads some film and starts getting undressed.  She imagines what it would be like if there was a really hot guy taking her picture... telling her what to do, how to move.  Kat can feel herself getting turned on as her clothes gradually come off and she begins snapping pictures of herself in the mirror.  She slips out of her panties, lifts one knee to her chest and takes a picture of the wetness down there... Picture perfect.
